name: Armageddon
plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

name: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

name: The Sixth Sense
plot: A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

name: Lagaan
plot: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against the British rulers.

name: Amélie
plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

name: First Blood
plot: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

name: Thomas & Friends
plot: This series follows the adventures of Thomas the Tank Engine and all of his engine friends on the Island of Sodor.

name: The Polar Express
plot: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

name: Casablanca
plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: Dumb and Dumber
plot: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.
